duties_responsibilities.duty: Overseeing IBMF Reporting & Analysis team with a special focus on the IBMF financial statements and related disclosures.
Supporting IBMF business accounting matters, consolidation, and reporting.
Collaborating across various areas, including CHQ Accounting, PwC, External Reporting, Finance, Treasury, and acting as the lead of IBMF Accounting teams at a global level.
Making significant contributions to high-profile operational initiatives as the business continues to grow globally.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field (Master's preferred)
